niaz9930

Class Counters

  • java.lang.Object
    • niaz9930.Counters

  • public class Counters
extends java.lang.Object
    This immutable class is used to store and represent statistics involving single lines of input.
    Version:
    1.8, 24 January 2017
    Author:
    Shakeel Niazi ID: 151749930 Email: niaz9930@mylaurier.ca

      • Counters

        public Counters(java.lang.String longestWord,
                int items,
                double spent,
                int wordCount,
                double averageWordLength,
                java.lang.String line)
        Stores statistics collected involving single lines of input
        Parameters:
        longestWord - The longest word in a line.
        items - The total number of items purchased that is indicated in a line.
        spent - The amount of dollars spent indicated in a line.
        wordCount - The total amount of words in a line.
        averageWordLength - The average word length in a line.
        line - The line that is being indicated.
